name: Conductor (itch) (Digital Fatigue)
description:
Conductor is a short puzzle-platformer created by Digital Fatigue, a team of game development students. You take the role of Professor Flynn Locke, an enigmatic scientist on a quest to uncover the secrets of an ancient civilization. Equipped with a lighting gun called the Thunderbuss, Flynn's journey begins.

Credits:

Gerad Paris: Project Lead, Programming, Particle Effects

Jenni Rivers: Art

Jared Roberge: Design, Sound

Robert Thomas: Programming

Music created by: nosoapradio (DST)

Check them out here!
